content: seascape is a featherweight wrap with sinuous lines of shifting yarn overs like ocean waves and strings of pearls a lot of people are adding an extra repeat of chart b for a longer stole the size can be also adjusted by changing needle size - for example kidsilk haze can be used with needles up to us8/5mm **may 2015 ** a new simplified one page version of seascape is now available - the fringe and motifs have been modified to fit on one chart and one page of written instructions **the free ravelry downloads are the 2015 one page seascape and a written pattern of the original 2008 seascape ** seascape was first published as a charted pattern in knitty summer 2008 **the original 2008 charted version continues to be available from knitty 2 ** kal here 3 for more photos visit the seascape stole 4 page on my website 1 http //www kieranfoley com/knit_lab_seascape_stole html 2 http //knitty com/issuesummer08/pattseascape html 3 http //www ravelry com/groups/seascape-knitalong 4 http //www kieranfoley com/knit_lab_seascape_stole html
